short_summary: Purchase of Laundry and Dry-cleaning Services
description: This procurement is for the purchase of laundry and dry-cleaning services. TheServices are required for the Department of National defence. the contract will involve the provision of laundry and dry-cleaning services including carrying out laundry and dry-cleaning processes and providing laundered and drycleaned items to the department of national defence.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
thewrite-up
================

### Government Tender Announcement

**Title (English) and French**: W4295-23S003 - Laundry and dry-cleaning services

**Solicitation Number**: WS4007232667

**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

**UNSPC Code**: 47110000 - Industrial laundry and dry cleaning equipment

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

### Important Dates

- **Publication Date**: June 30, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: July 20, 2023

### Status

**Tender Status (English) and French**: Cancelled (en annulé)

### Contract Details

- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: Yukon
- **Trade Agreements**: This solicitation may be funded under any of the following trade agreements:
   - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
   - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
   - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
   - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
   - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
   - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
   - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
   - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
   - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
   - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
   - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Christine Cress (SPAC/PSPC)
christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16728914?extsite=MTY3Mjg5MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
